Text: Employee Focus Group on PRC Cc In preparation for the Employee Focus Group on PRC scheduled for October please take a moment and review both the attached agenda and presentation We look forward to hearing your comments and recommendations If you have any questions or difficulties viewing the documents please contact Allyson Zykorie x Thank youxmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice Global Performance Management

Employee Focus Group Cc The Global Performance Management team greatly appreciated the suggestions and recommendations provided by the employee PRC Focus Group and would like to again thank those of you who were able to participate Your continued feedback and input remains important to us and we would like to host another meeting to update the group on where we are in implementing some of your recommendations for the Yearend Performance Management Process This meeting will be held on October th from am pm in room C please contact Allyson Zykorie x mailto to confirm your participation We would appreciate your response by Monday October xmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice We look forward to your participation and contribution Thank you Gina Corteselli Director Global Performance Management

PRC EMPLOYEE FOCUS GROUP Cc As you are aware over the past several weeks the VPMD PRC Committee has been challenged with making necessary refinements to the performance management process at Enron We had hoped to have clarification from the Committee by our scheduled meeting on October but we have not yet received the Committees input As a result we would like to reschedule the second Employee Focus Group to a later date so that we can more accurately inform you as to where Enron is in the process of implementing changes and recommendations for the Year End Performance Management Process We apologize for any inconvenience Thank you Gina Corteselli Director Global Performance Management

Employee Focus Group on PRC Cc In preparation for the Employee Focus Group on PRC scheduled for October please take a moment and review both the attached agenda and presentation We look forward to hearing your comments and recommendations If you have any questions or difficulties viewing the documents please contact Allyson Zykorie x Thank youxmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice Global Performance Management

Cc The Global Performance Management Team has proposed that Ken Lay do a Broadcast Voice Mail concerning the Year End Global Performance Management Process I have drafted a memo with the proposed content and am attaching in hopes that you can review and edit If you respond as to the memo by Monday October it would be greatly appreciated Thank you Allyson Zykorie
